message: Hello Bob! Thank you for considering purchasing my product. I believe it offers great value and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested, but $120 is a bit higher than I was hoping for. Would you consider $90?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle? I'm willing to lower my price to $110. I believe this is a fair deal considering the value of the product.
Thanks, Alice. $110 is still a little more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $95.
